issue.title: [C++] Improve type support for 'replace_with_mask' kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14172](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14172). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This kernel lacks support for variable-width types. It should probably also directly handle dictionaries, and it may be a good opportunity to look at optimization as well.
